messages.title: ALAN SAYS...
messages.content: I have lived in the Milton Keynes/North Bucks area for over 30 years and have been a Research Fellow for a transport organisation at the Open University and a Parish Councillor.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a publicly funded NHS free at the point of use and end the creeping privatisation of its services. Make mental health a much higher priority with resources to match this status.
Return the railways to public hands to stop profits before passengers. Introduce an immediate 10% cut in fares. Increase investment in public transport.
Abolish the unfair Bedroom Tax. Build 500,000 new social rented homes and bring empty homes back into use. Introduce rent caps and longer tenancies for renters.

Take serious action to ensure global temperatures do not rise further. Phase out fossil fuel based energy generation and nuclear power. Invest in renewable energy, flood defences and building insulation.

issues.environment: Invest in renewable energy, flood defences and building insulation.
issues.health: Fight for a publicly funded NHS free at the point of use.
issues.socialWelfare: Make mental health a much higher priority with resources to match this status.

housing.content: Build 500,000 new social rented homes and bring empty homes back into use. Introduce rent caps and longer tenancies for renters.
